author: Evan Minsker
title: Belle and Sebastian Announce Tour
text:
Belle and Sebastian Announce Tour Shows with Spoon, Andrew Bird, Ex Hex, Julien Baker, and Porches Photo by Søren Solkær 
Belle and Sebastian have announced a string of North American dates to add to their upcoming world tour. They’re playing shows with Spoon, Andrew Bird, Ex Hex, Julien Baker, and Porches. Find their itinerary below. The tour announcement’s press release notes that they’re at work on new music, which is due sometime this year via Matador. They plan to unveil some of that new music on tour. Their last album was 2015’s Girls in Peacetime Want to Dance . 
Read Pitchfork’s 5-10-15-20 interview with Stuart Murdoch. 
Belle and Sebastian: 
06-15 London, England - Royal Hospital Chelsea 07-06 Madrid, Spain - MAD COOL Festival 07-07 Glasgow, Scotland - TRNSMT Festival 07-20 Dublin, Ireland - Glasgow Green 07-27 Toronto, Ontario - Sony Centre * 07-29 New York, NY - Panorama Music and Arts Festival 07-30 Columbia, MD - Merriweather Post Pavilion ^%# 07-31 Raleigh, NC - North Carolina Museum of Art % 08-02 Boston, MA - Blue Hills Bank Pavilion %$ 08-03 Philadelphia, PA - Mann Center for Performing Arts %$ 08-06 Los Angeles, CA - Hollywood Bowl ^& 
* with Julien Baker
